name: ToolConfigurator
author: Pierre Rioux <pierre.rioux@mcgill.ca>
description: An administrative utility to help build configure a tool based on another tool. Also supports building the Apptainer image associated with the configuration.
command-line: true This command is only used when building the Apptainer container image, ignore this: TC1:[OLD_TC_ID] TC2:[NEW_TC_ID] [COPY_GROUP_ID] [COPY_QSUB] [COPY_ENV] [COPY_BASH] [COPY_OVERLAYS]; ( if test [BUILD_MODE] = 'docker-daemon' ; then docker pull [DOCKER_NAME] || exit 22 ; fi ; apptainer build [APPTAINER_IMAGE_NAME] [BUILD_MODE]://[DOCKER_NAME] )

inputs.name: ToolConfig to configure
inputs.description: The ToolConfig to configure (called 'NEW' in the rest of the form)

inputs.name: ToolConfig baseline
inputs.description: The ToolConfig to use as a baseline (called 'OLD' in the rest of the form)

inputs.name: Copy prologues and epilogues?
inputs.description: Copy the bash prologues and epilogues

inputs.name: Copy Apptainer overlays and options?
inputs.description: Copy the settings for Apptainer overlays, options (including short workdirs)

inputs.name: Build Image Mode
inputs.description: The source for the Apptainer image that will be assigned to the NEW ToolConfig. The image can be build from Docker, or just copied if an existing image exists in the OLD ToolConfig. When building, use 'docker-daemon' if there is a local docker system, and the tool will pull to it before building the Apptainer image. When using 'docker', Apptainer will pull directly for DockerHub instead.
value-choices: (Do not build or configure an Apptainer image)
(Use the existing Apptainer image from the OLD ToolConfig)

inputs.name: Docker image name
inputs.description: Name of the docker image, as "org/name:version"

inputs.name: Apptainer SIF image file name
inputs.description: The name of the Apptainer image file to build, like 'xyz.sif'. The image will be saved in the DataProvider selected for the CBRAIN task.

groups.name: ToolConfigs Selection
groups.description: What TC to configure, and what other TC to use to import values (if any)

groups.name: ToolConfig attributes to copy
groups.description: Which attributes to copy from the OLD ToolConfig to the NEW one. Use the 'Preview' buttons above to inspect these values in each ToolConfig.

groups.name: Apptainer build/configure options
groups.description: How to build a container for the NEW ToolConfig

output-files.name: Apptainer image file
output-files.description: The SIF file created by Apptainer

custom.cbrain:author: Pierre Rioux <pierre.rioux@mcgill.ca>
cbrain:input_notes: Click Refresh as often as necessary; both Refresh buttons are identical.
Each selection box has a top entry 'All' which you can use to filter its list by Tool, based on what is selected in the OTHER selection box.
The Refresh buttons alway re-update all other fields in the form!
Select twice the same ToolConfig if you don't need to copy anything.
Nothing is updated or built until you click 'Launch' at the bottom.
If you are building an Apptainer image, the image will be saved in the task's results DataProvider.
CBRAIN will ask for a result DataProvider even if you are not building anything.
The copy operations happen as soon as you click 'Launch'; the build (if any) will create a CBRAIN task.
If no image is being built, the copying will be performed and the form will just redisplay. Review the changes in the NEW ToolConfig.
